description: Welcome to your dream home in the highly sought after neighborhood of Maplewood Heights. This stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom property is the perfect blend of luxury and comfort. As you enter, you are greeted by a spacious open floor plan, featuring high ceilings and large windows that flood the home with natural light. The gourmet kitchen boasts granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large island, making it the ideal space for entertaining guests. The cozy living room with a fireplace is the perfect spot to relax after a long day. The master suite is a true oasis with a walk-in closet and a spa-like en-suite bathroom. Step outside onto the expansive deck, overlooking the beautifully landscaped backyard, perfect for outdoor gatherings. This home also includes a bonus room, ideal for a home office or gym. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your forever home.
neighborhood_description: Maplewood Heights is a diverse and vibrant neighborhood, known for its tight-knit community and beautiful tree-lined streets. Residents here enjoy the convenience of being just a short drive away from downtown

description: Welcome to this charming colonial-style home nestled in the vibrant community of Eastleigh Park. As you enter the front door, you are greeted by a spacious living room featuring a cozy fireplace and large windows that fill the room with natural light. The open-concept kitchen is a chef's dream, complete with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a breakfast nook. Upstairs, the master suite boasts a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom with a luxurious soaking tub. The backyard oasis is perfect for entertaining, with a deck, built-in BBQ, and a fire pit. This home also includes a bonus room that can be used as a home office or guest bedroom.
neighborhood_description: Eastleigh Park is a diverse and lively neighborhood, known for its tree-lined streets and friendly community. Residents enjoy easy access to a variety of amenities, including parks, restaurants, and shops. The neighborhood is also home to top-rated schools, making it an ideal location for families. description: This charming craftsman-style home is nestled in the desirable neighborhood of Redwood Heights. As you enter the front door, you are greeted by a spacious living room with high ceilings and large windows that flood the room with natural light. The open floor plan seamlessly flows into the updated kitchen, featuring granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar. The main level also includes a cozy family room with a fireplace, perfect for relaxing evenings. Upstairs, you will find a luxurious master suite with a walk-in closet and a spa-like bathroom, complete with a soaking tub and separate shower. The backyard offers a peaceful retreat with a spacious deck, ideal for outdoor dining and entertaining.
neighborhood_description: Redwood Heights is a diverse and welcoming neighborhood, known for its friendly community and beautiful tree-lined streets. Residents enjoy easy access to hiking trails in nearby parks, as well as local cafes, restaurants, and boutique shops. description: Welcome to this charming Victorian-style home in the vibrant and diverse neighborhood of Oak Park. As you enter through the front porch, you'll notice the beautiful hardwood floors and high ceilings that give this home a spacious and airy feel. The main level features a cozy living room with a decorative fireplace, a formal dining room with original built-in cabinetry, and a modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Upstairs, you'll find three bedrooms, including a master suite with a walk-in closet and a luxurious en-suite bathroom. The finished basement offers additional living space, perfect for a home office or media room. The backyard is a true oasis with a deck, patio, and landscaped garden, perfect for outdoor entertaining.
neighborhood_description: Oak Park is a diverse and welcoming community known for its beautiful tree-lined streets, historic homes, and lively entertainment and dining scene. You'll find a mix of families, young professionals, and artists in this neighborhood, creating a vibrant and eclectic atmosphere. description: This stunning 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home in the vibrant neighborhood of West Haven is the perfect blend of modern luxury and historic charm. As you enter through the grand front porch, you are greeted by a spacious living room with soaring ceilings and large windows that flood the space with natural light. The recently renovated kitchen boasts high-end stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a large island, making it a chef's dream. The primary bedroom features a luxurious en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet. The backyard oasis is complete with a deck, perfect for outdoor entertaining, and a detached studio, perfect for a home office or gym. This home also has a two-car garage and a long driveway, providing ample parking space. Located just steps away from trendy restaurants, cafes, and shops, and only a short commute to downtown, this home offers the perfect balance of city living and suburban tranquility.

description: Welcome to this stunning modern home located in the desirable Westwood Heights neighborhood. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom house boasts 2,100 sqft of living space and has been completely renovated with high-end finishes. The main level features an open concept layout with a bright and airy living room, a gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances, and a dining area that leads out to the spacious backyard. Upstairs, you'll find the master bedroom with a luxurious en-suite bathroom, two additional bedrooms, and another full bathroom. The lower level includes a finished basement perfect for a home office or playroom. This home also includes a 2-car garage and a large deck, perfect for outdoor entertaining. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your dream home!

description: Welcome to this stunning home nestled in the vibrant and eclectic neighborhood of Silverlake Heights. This beautiful property boasts 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, perfect for a growing family or those who love to entertain. As you enter through the grand double doors, you will be greeted by an open and airy living space with high ceilings and large windows that flood the home with natural light. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, granite countertops, and a spacious island for prep and storage. The master suite is a true oasis, complete with a luxurious en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet. Step outside to the backyard and you'll find a private oasis with a sparkling pool and spa, surrounded by lush landscaping and a built-in BBQ, perfect for outdoor gatherings. Other unique features of this home include a cozy fireplace, hardwood floors, and a 2-car garage.

description: Welcome to this stunning colonial home nestled in the charming and diverse neighborhood of Oakwood Heights. As you enter, you'll be greeted by a grand two-story foyer with a beautiful spiral staircase. The main level features an open concept layout with a spacious living room, perfect for entertaining guests. The kitchen boasts granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large island with seating. Upstairs, you'll find a luxurious master suite with a walk-in closet and a spa-like en-suite bathroom. The fully finished basement offers additional living space, perfect for a home theater or gym.
